name: event-agent-role
title: EventAgentRole
description: A role filled by an Agent with respect to a dwc:Event.

fields.name: agentID
fields.title: Agent ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: eventID
fields.title: Event ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: agentRole
fields.title: Agent Role
fields.description: A category that best matches the nature of a role of an Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary for the roles appropriate to the class of resource an AgentRole is related to.

fields.name: agentRoleIRI
fields.title: Agent Role IRI
fields.description: An IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for a role of an Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: agentRoleVocabulary
fields.title: Agent Role Vocabulary
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in agentRole is given.

fields.name: agentRoleOrder
fields.title: Agent Role Order
fields.description: A numerical position of an AgentRole in a set of AgentRoles that have the same combination of agentRole, agentRoleIRI, agentRoleVocabulary and related target.
fields.comments: One could use agentRoleOrder to create an ordered list of collectors (agentRole = 'collector') for a dwc:MaterialEntity, for example. The first would have agentRoleOrder=1, the second would have agentRoleOrder=2.

fields.name: agentRoleDate
fields.title: Agent Role Date
fields.description: An interval during which an AgentRole was in effect.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
